attributes.action: Stop pupils from having to self isolate
attributes.additional_details:
Because my child has been isolating for more of this term than she has been in school which is having a detrimental effect on her mental health as well as her education. 
Hundreds of thousands of children are in the same position. The children have suffered enough. We need to live with this virus and our children should not be made to suffer, when they see all the adults getting back to normal this is having a further detrimental effect on their health.
attributes.background: Stop isolation for pupils who have been a contact of a positive case, replace with daily testing

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590093
